trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ProfileMigrateEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>事件<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>类在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中，如本主题的示例中所示。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous> event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when someone who has been anonymously using your application logs in.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>事件将复制到经过身份验证的配置文件有人具有已以匿名方式使用你应用程序日志时的匿名配置文件的配置文件属性值</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>

trans-unit.source: When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，继承<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, based on the profile properties specified in the Web.config file, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name.
trans-unit.target: 当`ProfileCommon`基于在 Web.config 文件中，指定的配置文件属性生成类`GetProfile`方法将添加可用于检索`ProfileCommon`对象基于用户名称。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`GetProfile`要检索的匿名配置文件的属性值的当前配置文件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 然后，匿名属性值可以复制到经过身份验证的用户的当前配置文件中。
